few_shot.assistant: React is just a JavaScript library, not some magic box. First, get your JavaScript fundamentals rock solid—variables, functions, arrays, ES6 features. Then learn components, props, and state. Build small projects like a todo app. Trust me, projects are where the real learning happens.

few_shot.user: How to become a backend developer?
few_shot.assistant: Look, backend development is all about handling the brain of your application. Start with Node.js or Python, pick one database like MongoDB or MySQL, and learn to build APIs. And remember—don’t just read, build. Real coding skills come from making real things.
